content:
Diagnosis: Essential Hypertension
Date: 2024-09-15
ICD-10: I10
Notes: Patient with consistent elevated blood pressure readings over past 3 months.

Diagnosis: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
Date: 2024-11-03
ICD-10: E11.9
Notes: Patient presents with elevated blood glucose. Recommend lifestyle changes and medication.

Diagnosis: Chronic kidney disease, stage 3
Date: 2025-01-20
ICD-10: N18.3
Notes: Decreased eGFR, likely due to diabetes and hypertension. Monitor closely.

Medication: Lisinopril
Dosage: 10 mg
Frequency: Once daily
Prescribed for hypertension management.

Medication: Metformin
Dosage: 500 mg
Frequency: Twice daily
Prescribed for type 2 diabetes management.

Medication: Atorvastatin
Dosage: 20 mg
Frequency: Once daily at bedtime
Prescribed for hyperlipidemia management.

Test: HbA1c
Result: 8.2 %
Reference Range: 4.0 - 5.6
Notes: Indicates poor glycemic control over past 3 months.

Test: eGFR
Result: 45 mL/min/1.73mÂ²
Reference Range: >60
Notes: Reduced kidney function, consistent with stage 3 CKD.

Test: Total Cholesterol
Result: 240 mg/dL
Reference Range: <200
Notes: Elevated, indicating hyperlipidemia.

Blood Pressure: 148/92
Heart Rate: 84
Temperature: 98.4 F
Weight: 205 lb
Notes: Blood pressure remains elevated despite medication.
